it has three different forms,

Now the first sentence,
There is a house.

English to show something.

If we take the second sentence,
It’s their house.
It’s a different form of ‘their’.

In this case, as you probably know, it’s
the possessive.
Ok?
The house belongs to them.
It’s their house.

And in the third sentence,
They’re in the house.

It’s obviously the contraction of the verb,
‘to be’, so
They are in the house.
Ok, so three different forms.
Now, listen very carefully.

Their

Now, can you hear a difference?

There is no difference, guys.
The pronunciation is exactly the same.

And because the pronunciation is the same,
many students gets confused when they write.
And they make spelling mistakes.
Ok?
So be really careful when you write.

You have to know whether it’s the basic
form ‘there is’,

The possessive adjective, ‘there’,
or the contraction of ‘they are’.

This is very important not to make spelling
mistakes.

And when you pronounce them,
don’t make it more complicated than it is.
The sound is exactly the same.
